name: Carbon-Elite Caster
description: Ultra-high modulus carbon fiber construction. Precision-balanced for long, accurate casts. The ultimate choice for tournament anglers.

name: Ocean-Blue Deep Sea
description: Built to withstand the toughest ocean conditions. Reinforced golden guides and a solid backbone for big game battles.

name: Trout-Whisperer Lite
description: A delicate fly rod with a soft touch. Perfect for presentation in crystal clear mountain streams. Features a premium cork handle.

name: Spin-Doctor Precision
description: 12+1 stainless steel ball bearings for butter-smooth rotation. Sealed drag system ensures performance in any environment.

reviews.text: Very nice drag, but a bit heavy.

name: Bait-Runner Carbon GT
description: Stealthy matte black finish with carbon fiber handle. High-speed gear ratio for quick retrievals and aggressive hook sets.

name: Classic-Aura Fly Reel
description: Timeless design meeting modern engineering. Vintage aesthetic with a wide-arbor spool for reduced line memory.

name: Neon Ghost Minnow
description: Translucent ghost-body with internal neon neuro-light technology. Irresistible to predators in low-light conditions.

reviews.text: They hit it like a truck at dusk!

name: Deep-Sea Kraken Jig
description: Hyper-realistic multi-tentacle action. Iridescent scales and emerald glowing eyes designed to mimic deep-sea cephalopods.

name: Voltage Electric Eel
description: Sinuous swimming motion with blue lightning patterns. Creates micro-vibrations that trigger lateral line responses.

name: Molten Magma Crank
description: Built for high-energy aggression. The cracked-lava finish creates unique light reflections in murky waters.

name: Cyber-Byte Robotic Frog
description: Steampunk-inspired surface popper. Brass gears and robotic movements create a erratic splashing profile.

name: Storm-Shield Chest Waders
description: Professional grade camouflage waders. 5-layer breathable fabric with reinforced puncture-resistant knees.

reviews.text: Best waders I have owned. No leaks after a season.

name: Aqua-Shield UV Hoodie
description: Lightweight, cooling fabric with SPF 50+ protection. Integrated neck gaiter for total sun coverage on the water.

name: Offshore Heavy Jacket
description: Tested in the North Sea. Extreme wind and water protection with high-visibility reflective elements.

name: Quantum X Carbon Rod 7ft
description: High-modulus carbon fiber construction with a fast-action tip for superior sensitivity and hook-setting power.

name: Stealth-Glide Spinning Reel
description: Featuring a magnesium body and ceramic ball bearings for a feather-light feel and silent, smooth retrieval.

reviews.text: Smooth as silk, but slightly pricey.

name: Electro-Vibe Bass Popper
description: Water-activated LED technology mimics wounded baitfish distress signals, irresistible to aggressive bass.

name: Hydro-Breaker Gore-Tex Jacket
description: Elite-level waterproofing and breathability for extreme offshore conditions. Rated for 48 hours of heavy rain.

reviews.text: Stayed bone dry in a gale.

name: Digital-Drag Baitcaster
description: Microprocessor-controlled drag system eliminates backlashes and provides precision tension for every species.

name: Titanium Flex Surf Rod 14ft
description: Engineered for distance casting, this titanium-composite rod offers a parabolic bend that launches weights beyond the horizon.

name: Bio-Scent Soft Craw
description: Biodegradable polymer injected with pheromone technology to trigger predatory instincts in bass and walleye.

reviews.text: Finally, an eco-friendly soft bait that works.

name: Thermal-Regulated Wader System
description: Breathable chest waders with active heating elements in the booties, controllable via smartphone app for all-day comfort.

reviews.text: My feet stayed warm in 30 degree water.

name: Apex Predator Trolling Rod
description: Heavy-action rod designed for big game fishing, featuring AFTCO rollers and a rigid composite blank for marlin and tuna.

name: Quantum Sync Electric Reel
description: Programmable electric assist reel with auto-stop depth memory and LCD line counter for precision deep dropping.

name: UV-Shield Angling Hoodie
description: Ultra-light fabric with UPF 50+ protection and cooling crystal fibers woven into the material for desert heat rejection.

name: Sonic-Vibe Blade Bait
description: Tungsten blade bait with tuned frequency chambers that emit low-frequency vibrations to attract fish in muddy water.

name: Micro-Finesse Fly Rod 3wt
description: A masterpiece of engineering for fly fishing purists, offering delicate presentations with nano-silica resin technology.

name: Hydro-Touch Spinning Reel 2500
description: Features a touch-sensitive graphite rotor system and 11+1 ball bearings for ultra-smooth freshwater performance.

name: Stealth-Frame Polarized Glasses
description: Polycarbonate lenses with hydrophobic coating and titanium frames that float, ensuring you never lose your sight on the water.

name: Abyssal Jigging Metal Lure
description: Asymmetric metal jig designed for erratic falling action, finished with a multi-layered corrosion-resistant coating.

name: Kevlar-Reinforced Landing Glove
description: Cut-resistant protection for handling toothy species, featuring a textured grip and quick-dry synthetic leather.

name: Tournament Pro Cast Net
description: High-radius spread net with 1lb lead weights per foot for rapid sinking and minimal escape routes for live bait.

name: Compact Telescopic Travel Rod
description: High-modulus carbon rod that collapses to 18 inches, perfect for the jet-setting angler who refuses to compromise on quality.

name: All-Terrain Wading Boots
description: Featuring interchangeable stud systems and a Vibram sole for ultimate traction on slick rocks and muddy banks.
